Mr. Dursley.name: Mr. Dursley
Mr. Dursley.role: Director of Grunnings, husband of Mrs. Dursley, father of Dudley, uncle of Harry Potter

Mrs. Dursley.name: Petunia Dursley
Mrs. Dursley.role: Wife of Mr. Dursley, mother of Dudley, aunt of Harry Potter, sister of Lily Potter

Dudley Dursley.name: Dudley Dursley
Dudley Dursley.role: Son of Mr. and Mrs. Dursley, cousin of Harry Potter

Harry Potter.name: Harry Potter
Harry Potter.role: Nephew of Mr. and Mrs. Dursley, cousin of Dudley, son of Lily and James Potter, known as 'The Boy Who Lived'

Mrs. Potter.name: Lily Potter
Mrs. Potter.role: Sister of Mrs. Dursley, wife of James Potter, mother of Harry Potter

Mr. Potter.name: James Potter
Mr. Potter.role: Harry's father, wizard, deceased, killed by Voldemort

Albus Dumbledore.name: Albus Dumbledore
Albus Dumbledore.role: Headmaster of Hogwarts, powerful wizard, respected figure in the wizarding world

Professor McGonagall.name: Professor McGonagall
Professor McGonagall.role: Deputy Headmistress, Head of Gryffindor House, Transfiguration teacher

Voldemort.name: Voldemort
Voldemort.role: Dark wizard, responsible for the death of Harry's parents, feared in the wizarding world

Hagrid.name: Hagrid
Hagrid.role: Keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwarts, introduces Harry to the wizarding world

Sirius Black.name: Sirius Black
Sirius Black.role: Owner of the motorcycle Hagrid borrowed

Dedalus Diggle.name: Dedalus Diggle
Dedalus Diggle.role: Patron at the Leaky Cauldron, previously met Harry and is thrilled he remembers

Madam Pomfrey.name: Madam Pomfrey
Madam Pomfrey.role: Mentioned by Dumbledore as someone who complimented his earmuffs

Mrs. Figg.name: Mrs. Figg
Mrs. Figg.role: Neighbor of the Dursleys, often looks after Harry

Auntie Marge.name: Marge
Auntie Marge.role: Sister of Vernon Dursley, dislikes Harry

Piers Polkiss.name: Piers Polkiss
Piers Polkiss.role: Best friend of Dudley, part of Dudley's gang

Mrs. Next Door.name: Mrs. Next Door
Mrs. Next Door.role: Neighbor of the Dursleys, mentioned in gossip by Mrs. Dursley

Mrs. Next Door's Daughter.name: Mrs. Next Door's Daughter
Mrs. Next Door's Daughter.role: Daughter of Mrs. Next Door, mentioned in gossip

Minerva McGonagall.name: Minerva McGonagall
Minerva McGonagall.role: Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts, signs Harry's acceptance letter

Cornelius Fudge.name: Cornelius Fudge
Cornelius Fudge.role: Minister of Magic, described as a bungler by Hagrid

Tom.name: Tom
Tom.role: Bartender at the Leaky Cauldron, recognizes Hagrid and Harry

Doris Crockford.name: Doris Crockford
Doris Crockford.role: Patron at the Leaky Cauldron, excited to meet Harry Potter

Quirinus Quirrell.name: Quirinus Quirrell
Quirinus Quirrell.role: Professor of Defense Against the Dark Arts at Hogwarts, nervous and stammering

Madam Malkin.name: Madam Malkin
Madam Malkin.role: Owner of Madam Malkin's Robes for All Occasions, fits Harry for his Hogwarts robes

Draco Malfoy.name: Draco Malfoy
Draco Malfoy.role: Young wizard, Hogwarts student, encounters Harry at Madam Malkin's, comes from a wizarding family, likely Slytherin

Griphook.name: Griphook
Griphook.role: Goblin at Gringotts, assists Harry and Hagrid with accessing vaults

Miranda Goshawk.name: Miranda Goshawk
Miranda Goshawk.role: Author of 'The Standard Book of Spells (Grade 1)', listed in Harry's Hogwarts supplies

Bathilda Bagshot.name: Bathilda Bagshot
Bathilda Bagshot.role: Author of 'A History of Magic', listed in Harry's Hogwarts supplies

Adalbert Waffling.name: Adalbert Waffling
Adalbert Waffling.role: Author of 'Magical Theory', listed in Harry's Hogwarts supplies

Emeric Switch.name: Emeric Switch
Emeric Switch.role: Author of 'A Beginners' Guide to Transfiguration', listed in Harry's Hogwarts supplies

Phyllida Spore.name: Phyllida Spore
Phyllida Spore.role: Author of 'One Thousand Magical Herbs and Fungi', listed in Harry's Hogwarts supplies

Arsenius Jigger.name: Arsenius Jigger
Arsenius Jigger.role: Author of 'Magical Drafts and Potions', listed in Harry's Hogwarts supplies

Newt Scamander.name: Newt Scamander
Newt Scamander.role: Author of 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them', listed in Harry's Hogwarts supplies

Quentin Trimble.name: Quentin Trimble
Quentin Trimble.role: Author of 'The Dark Forces: A Guide to Self-Protection', listed in Harry's Hogwarts supplies

Vindictus Viridian.name: Vindictus Viridian
Vindictus Viridian.role: Author of 'Curses and Countercurses', a book Harry is interested in at Flourish and Blotts

Ron Weasley.name: Ron Weasley
Ron Weasley.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Gryffindor, Harry's friend

Hermione Granger.name: Hermione Granger
Hermione Granger.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Gryffindor, studious and eager

Neville Longbottom.name: Neville Longbottom
Neville Longbottom.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Gryffindor, clumsy and forgetful

Vincent Crabbe.name: Vincent Crabbe
Vincent Crabbe.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Slytherin, friend of Draco Malfoy

Gregory Goyle.name: Gregory Goyle
Gregory Goyle.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Slytherin, friend of Draco Malfoy

Percy Weasley.name: Percy Weasley
Percy Weasley.role: Prefect, older Gryffindor student, Ron's brother

Fred Weasley.name: Fred Weasley
Fred Weasley.role: Older Gryffindor student, one of Ron's twin brothers, prankster

George Weasley.name: George Weasley
George Weasley.role: Older Gryffindor student, one of Ron's twin brothers, prankster

Professor Severus Snape.name: Professor Severus Snape
Professor Severus Snape.role: Potions teacher, Head of Slytherin House, antagonistic toward Harry

Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington.name: Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington
Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington.role: Resident ghost of Gryffindor Tower, also known as Nearly Headless Nick

Argus Filch.name: Argus Filch
Argus Filch.role: Caretaker at Hogwarts, strict and disliked by students

Mrs. Norris.name: Mrs. Norris
Mrs. Norris.role: Argus Filch's cat, patrols Hogwarts corridors

Professor Binns.name: Professor Binns
Professor Binns.role: History of Magic teacher at Hogwarts, a ghost

Madam Hooch.name: Madam Hooch
Madam Hooch.role: Flying instructor and Quidditch referee at Hogwarts

Hannah Abbott.name: Hannah Abbott
Hannah Abbott.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Hufflepuff

Susan Bones.name: Susan Bones
Susan Bones.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Hufflepuff

Terry Boot.name: Terry Boot
Terry Boot.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Ravenclaw

Mandy Brocklehurst.name: Mandy Brocklehurst
Mandy Brocklehurst.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Ravenclaw

Lavender Brown.name: Lavender Brown
Lavender Brown.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, Gryffindor, friend of Parvati

Millicent Bulstrode.name: Millicent Bulstrode
Millicent Bulstrode.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Slytherin

Justin Finch-Fletchley.name: Justin Finch-Fletchley
Justin Finch-Fletchley.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Hufflepuff

Seamus Finnigan.name: Seamus Finnigan
Seamus Finnigan.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Gryffindor

Morag MacDougal.name: Morag MacDougal
Morag MacDougal.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, house not specified in this section

Moon.name: Moon
Moon.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, house not specified in this section

Nott.name: Nott
Nott.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, house not specified in this section

Parkinson.name: Parkinson
Parkinson.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, house not specified in this section

Pansy Parkinson.name: Pansy Parkinson
Pansy Parkinson.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Slytherin

Parvati Patil.name: Parvati Patil
Parvati Patil.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, one of the Patil twins, house not specified in this section but implied Gryffindor

Sally-Anne Perks.name: Sally-Anne Perks
Sally-Anne Perks.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, house not specified in this section

Dean Thomas.name: Dean Thomas
Dean Thomas.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, Gryffindor, West Ham fan

Lisa Turpin.name: Lisa Turpin
Lisa Turpin.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Ravenclaw

Blaise Zabini.name: Blaise Zabini
Blaise Zabini.role: First-year student at Hogwarts, sorted into Slytherin

Charlie Weasley.name: Charlie Weasley
Charlie Weasley.role: Former Gryffindor Quidditch player, Ron's older brother, works with dragons

Great Uncle Algie.name: Great Uncle Algie
Great Uncle Algie.role: Neville's great uncle, part of his wizarding family

Great Auntie Enid.name: Great Auntie Enid
Great Auntie Enid.role: Neville's great auntie, part of his wizarding family

Neville's Grandmother.name: Neville's Grandmother
Neville's Grandmother.role: Neville's grandmother, raised him, a witch

Oliver Wood.name: Oliver Wood
Oliver Wood.role: Gryffindor Quidditch team captain and Keeper

Lee Jordan.name: Lee Jordan
Lee Jordan.role: Quidditch commentator, Gryffindor student, friend of the Weasley twins

Nicolas Flamel.name: Nicolas Flamel
Nicolas Flamel.role: Historical figure associated with the object guarded at Hogwarts

Wizard Baruffio.name: Wizard Baruffio
Wizard Baruffio.role: Historical wizard known for a spell mishap

Ronan.name: Ronan
Ronan.role: Centaur living in the Forbidden Forest

Bane.name: Bane
Bane.role: Centaur living in the Forbidden Forest, more aggressive than Ronan

Firenze.name: Firenze
Firenze.role: Centaur living in the Forbidden Forest, saves Harry
